<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Ghosts of the Inner Sea](/Articles.aspx?ID=39)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 66</row>

No two spirits that linger beyond death are the same! This article presents histories, mysteries, and new powers.
name: Ghosts of the Inner Sea
